content.question: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, open parenthesis, sine of x times the cosecant of x, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mo>⋅</mo><mi>csc</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of cotangent squared of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 times the cotangent of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

topic.text: 2.10: Finding the Derivatives of Tangent, Cotangent, Secant, and/or Cosecant Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
